column4: another nooby question: "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop" returns "/etc/init.d/gdm: command not found"
is that a change in syntax from one ubuntu version to another?
if you are running 12.04 the default is lightdm (not gdm)
sudo service lightdm stop will stop lightdm and the whole X11 session, so yes you will lose your desktop
